Text: Several weeks later.
Here is the report on the food production line.

I see, thank you. Please be aware I will immediately
notify you of any revisions.
Understood.

Oh, right, how is our new low-priced tea line coming
along?

I've prepared a separate report in regards to that,
Lady Gamma.
Show me.
Here you are.

Hmm...you've narrowed down some places
for production.

With further inspection, we were hoping to decide
which plantation you would like to work with...
Right...this one here makes the finest tea.
Understooâ€”
Negotiate for the lowest price possible.
Huh?!
And, purchase three times the amount.
Nu, go tell Mitsugoshi's staff what I just said.
Can we do that?

It's fine. I'm sure the employee who wrote this
report could anticipate I would say such a thing.

Buy more for less. This is also one way of doing
business.

So that's the idea? Understood. Shall I inform the
other employees?

Yes... Please let them know it'll be a while before we
can sell the high-end tea, but that Lady Alpha did
indeed liked it.
I'm sure everyone will be delighted to hear that.

Please do so. I meant to tell you earlier, but I've
been so busy that I forgot.

Before, I used to search for places on my own to find
the very materials to recreate Shadow Wisdom.

With how far Mitsugoshi has come, its employees can
recreate it with the materials on site.

If I may, isn't giving proper instructions part of
your duties...?

You're right, a captain needs to point the ship in the
right direction. In the open sea that is business, one
cannot afford to get lost.

Also, have any employees expressed dissatisfaction?
While they may find it difficult to personally tell me,
they should have no problem telling you.
Dissatisfaction? Well..

Oh, you don't have to worry about reporting any
of that to me. I just want to make improvements
wherever we can.

Whether it's gossip you happened to have heard,
please tell me whatever you know.
Oh, I see. Well, then...
So there is something going on.

It's nothing big, but there have been some concerns
with the high-end tea line.
What about it?

It's really no big deal, but we have to bend forward
when picking the lea leaves, right?
Yea, you do it like thiâ€”
Huh, eh...waahâ€”!
Oof!
Lady Gamma?! A-Are you all right?!
Don't worry, please continue.

O-Okay. When leaning forward, staff are concerned
with...the outlines of their underwear showing.

I see... I happen to notice them whenever I fall down,
too. Even when wearing a slime bodysuit.
Yes, the slime fabric is soft and elastic.

Even with the slime fabric, the outlines show. So
when it comes to normal clothes... You see what
I mean?
This problem...could be a business opportunity.
Really?

Though the problem this time just happened to be
highlighted by the tea plantation, it's something
that troubles women everywhere.

If we can make underwear that does not show
outlines...it could be a big business opportunity!
I wonder if that's possible...

To get a better understanding of what I mean, try
imagining Lord Shadow in his underwear.

Th-That sounds...so embarrassing, I would want
to hide.

Okay, I have decided to do my first on-site survey...
It's been a while.
On-site survey...? Meaning...?
We are going to see the tea plantation first hand!
